thread.section_title: Wilson Amplifiers Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Wilson Amplifiers | wilsonamplifiers.com
thread.title: Steven Wilson
thread.title_full: Wilson Amplifiers reviewed by Steven Wilson

author: Steven Wilson
title: Steven Wilson
text: We have 6 amplifiers for our warehouse and management offices that were installed 3 years ago, and they still work VERY well. Recently our building was struck by lightening and the amplifiers booted up without error, all I had to replace were a few surge protectors and power cords. By far the easiest repair of the day.
